verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: made] [ARG1: unexpected statements] [ARGM-LOC: at the Group of Seven ( G7 ) Summit in Quebec , Canada] [ARGM-TMP: on Saturday] , [ARGM-TMP: before leaving to prepare for the summit with North Korea in Singapore] .
